prompts:
I want you to update the descripiton for the tester agent \
right now the description is like so:\
 Use proactively to generate comprehensive unit and integration tests for existing code with high coverage across happy path, edge cases, and error handling.\
\
I want this agent to not only be activate proactivly but that the claude main agent will use it when he needs to :\
generate comprehensive unit and integration tests for existing code with high coverage across happy path, edge cases, and error handling.\
and run tests and seeing where is the issues.\
\
add to it also that he runs tests using uv run --no-sync --offline to run any testing script that exists

Runs tests using `uv run --no-sync --offline` for any existing test scripts.\
\
this shouldt be in the description but the description should include that this agent is also for running tests.\
the Runs tests using `uv run --no-sync --offline` for any existing test scripts.\
will be in the instructions of the agent
